reviewText: I purchased this dvd for my 18 month old great niece and she enjoyed it with it's simple graphics and educational messages.
This is an entertaining show and teaches young children life skills and great values about sharing, respect, and caring. DVD is of good video and audio quality.

Pros: Root menu/main menu available for this product. Video quality is great. The kids love the product!
Cons: None that comes to mind.

My son watched these over and over when he was 1.5 to 2 years old. He first started watching Miffy on Noggin when he was 1.5 years old. I'm very picky about what is appropriate for my son to watch. Just because something is rated G doesn't make it appropriate. Kids are so impressionable at this age and believe everything they are told and that they see/hear. Miffy is innocent and teaches about love, friendship and every day things.

Disclaimer: I'm not advocating TV watching here - Pediatricians ask that you limit the amount of TV your toddler watches. We limit our son (now 3.5 years old) to one 1/2 hour show per day and one movie on Friday or Saturday.
